title: Teleporting to Zzrot minion
body:
Hello,

Has anyone else encountered this:

I teleported to a Zzrot minion, the minion froze in place during the channel, but the minions health continued to drain. After completion of the channel, I teleported to the minion before minions health depleted. I am not sure what would have happened if the minion lost all its health. Is this a bug or is this deliberate. Normally, teleporting to a minion freezes it in place and stops the health from draining. Any ideas or comments?

replies.body: i dont think its a bug, if you teleport to a ward or zz voidling as its about to die it will die but teleport will still go through, only thing that cancels a teleport upon destruction is a tower
Its not a bug. The game just doesn't allow you to extend the life of timed items by teleporting to them.
